metadata.title: CVE-2018-10778 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - untriaged
metadata.description: Read access violation in the III_dequantize_sample function inmpglibDBL/layer3.c in mp3gain through 1.5.2-r2 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecifiedother impact, a different vulnerability than CVE-2017-9872 andCVE-2017-14409.

criterions.comment: mp3gain: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
